7.name: Throwing Knives
7.attributes: Maximum Range: 6\u201d Ranged Roll-Offs using Throwing Knives gain a +1 bonus

8.name: Pistols
8.attributes: Maximum Range: 12\u201d Strong (1) Skill. Rolls of 1 and the weapon is broken.

9.name: Caliver
9.attributes: Maximum Range: 24\u201d +1 bonus to the Ranged Roll-Off and count as having the Strong (1) Skill. Rolls of 1 and the weapon is broken.

10.name: Blunderbuss
10.attributes: Maximum Range: 8\u201d Ranged Roll-Offs with a Blunderbuss receive a +3 bonus. Rolls of 1 and the weapon is broken.

12.name: Heavy Armour
12.attributes: Tough (2) and Nimbleness Roll-Offs suffer a -1 penalty.

13.name: Very Heavy Armour
13.attributes: Tough (3) and Nimbleness Roll-Offs suffer a -2 penalty.

16.name: Heavy Shield
16.attributes: +1 to all Block Roll-Offs and Tough (1). All Nimbleness Roll-Offs suffer a -1 penalty.

18.name: Mage's Focus
18.attributes: +1 to all Fortitude / Presence Roll-Offs for Casting Spells

19.name: Mage's Pouch
19.attributes: A character with a Mage's Pouch may carry up to 6 Spell Ingredients

20.name: Camouflage Cloak
20.attributes: +1 to all Concealment Roll-Offs, or +3 if no Armour is worn.

21.name: Healing Potion
21.attributes: restore d6 lost Wounds, and stop the effects of Poisons.
